question_name.english: Identify the hybridization state of central carbon atom:
question_name.hindi: केंद्रीय कार्बन परमाणु की संकरण अवस्था की पहचान करें:

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(150,75)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><text x='0' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>C</text><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='40' y2='-40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='40' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='-40' y2='0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='20' y2='0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><text x='30' y='-15' fill='black'>109.5°</text></g></svg>

question_name.english: Which resonance structure of benzene is shown here?
question_name.hindi: बेंजीन की कौन सी अनुनाद संरचना यहाँ दिखाई गई है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(150,75)'><polygon points='0,-40 34.6,-20 34.6,20 0,40 -34.6,20 -34.6,-20' fill='none' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='0' y1='-40' x2='34.6' y2='-20' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/><line x1='34.6' y1='20' x2='0' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/><line x1='-34.6' y1='20' x2='-34.6' y2='-20' stroke='black' stroke-width='4'/></g></svg>

question_name.english: What type of isomerism is shown in these structures?
question_name.hindi: इन संरचनाओं में किस प्रकार की समावयवता दिखाई गई है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(50,75)'><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='80' y2='0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><text x='40' y='-10' fill='black'>OH</text><g transform='translate(170,0)'><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='80' y2='0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><text x='40' y='20' fill='black'>OH</text></g></g></svg>

question_name.english: Identify the type of reaction mechanism shown:
question_name.hindi: दर्शाई गई अभिक्रिया का प्रकार पहचानें:

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(100,75)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><text x='0' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>C</text><line x1='20' y1='0' x2='80' y2='0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='100' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><text x='100' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>C</text><path d='M 40,-10 Q 60,0 40,10' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/></g></svg>

question_name.english: What is the IUPAC name of this structure?
question_name.hindi: इस संरचना का IUPAC नाम क्या है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(150,75)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><text x='0' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>C</text><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='40' y2='-40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='40' y2='40' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='-40' y2='0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><circle cx='-40' cy='0' r='15' fill='#9b9b9b'/><text x='-40' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>CH₃</text></g></svg>

question_name.english: Which conformational structure is shown here?
question_name.hindi: कौन सी अनुरूपी संरचना यहाँ दिखाई गई है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(150,75)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><line x1='-30' y1='0' x2='30' y2='0' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M 0,0 L 15,26 M 0,0 L -15,-26 M 0,0 L -15,26 M 0,0 L 15,-26' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/></g></svg>

question_name.english: What type of stereoisomerism is shown?
question_name.hindi: किस प्रकार की त्रिविम समावयवता दिखाई गई है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(100,75)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><text x='0' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>C</text><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='40' y2='-20' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='40' y2='20' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='-15' fill='black'>OH</text><text x='50' y='25' fill='black'>H</text><g transform='translate(100,0)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><text x='0' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>C</text><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='40' y2='-20' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='40' y2='20' stroke='black' stroke-width='2'/><text x='50' y='-15' fill='black'>H</text><text x='50' y='25' fill='black'>OH</text></g></g></svg>

question_name.english: Which orbital hybridization is shown in this structure?
question_name.hindi: इस संरचना में कौन सा कक्षक संकरण दिखाया गया है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(150,75)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><path d='M 0,0 Q 20,-20 40,-10 M 0,0 Q -20,-20 -40,-10 M 0,0 Q 20,20 40,10 M 0,0 Q -20,20 -40,10' stroke='black' stroke-width='2' fill='none'/><text x='0' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>C</text></g></svg>

question_name.english: What mechanism is shown in this reaction?
question_name.hindi: इस अभिक्रिया में कौन सी क्रियाविधि दिखाई गई है?

image: <svg width='300' height='150' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g transform='translate(150,75)'><circle cx='0' cy='0' r='20' fill='#4a90e2'/><text x='0' y='5' text-anchor='middle' fill='white'>C</text><path d='M -40,0 Q 0,-40 40,0 Q 0,40 -40,0' fill='none' stroke='red' stroke-width='2' stroke-dasharray='5,5'/><text x='-30' y='-20' fill='black'>Nu⁻</text><text x='30' y='-20' fill='black'>X⁻</text></g></svg>
